name: Potion of Minor Healing
description: Restores a small amount of health when consumed. Essential for surviving minor skirmishes.

name: Traveler's Cloak
description: A lightweight cloak enchanted to protect against cold and rain.

name: Elven Waybread
description: Magical bread that provides nourishment for an entire day with a single bite.

name: Runestone of Light
description: A glowing stone used to light up dark dungeons or forests.

name: Map of Forgotten Lands
description: A detailed map revealing hidden paths and ancient ruins.

name: Dagger of the Silent Step
description: A stealthy blade favored by rogues. Increases agility and stealth.
